sentences: Leslie Christopher Taylor (born December 27, 1948, in Oneida, Kentucky, United States) is an American country music artist.
His highest charting single, "I Gotta Mind to Go Crazy," peaked at No. 44 in 1991.
In 1980, Taylor became the contributing lead vocalist and rhythm guitarist of country-pop band Exile.
He performed with the group until 1989, when he left to pursue a solo career.
After parting ways with Epic, Taylor reunited with Exile in 1995 and continues to perform with the band.
